snippet: In trying times like these, the loss of any oracle of manners, kindness and courtesy, especially Letitia Baldrige, who was known as the “doyenne of decorum,” is immeasurable.
abstract: William Norwich reflects that in trying times like these, the loss of etiquette expert Letitia Baldridge, who has died at age 86, is immeasurable.
lead_paragraph: In trying times like these, the loss of any oracle of manners, kindness and courtesy, especially Letitia Baldrige, who was known as the “doyenne of decorum,” is immeasurable.
